short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Twitter by adding Emoji support and "View photo" support for Instagram pics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing blank squares on Twitter where Emoji should be?  This extension will make them appear as nice graphics.  Instagram photos are also made visible in the Tweet expanded area.

For a little while Instagram photos weren't showing up, but that is fixed now.

Please leave a review and tell your friends.  Easy URL to this page: www.TwitterEnhanced.com
